title: SMC_CamEditor (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_CamEditor
This function block is used to display cam tables in the visualization.
Important
This function block does not work without either a
TargetVisu
or a
WebVisu
.

rows.Name: bEnable
rows.Comment: FALSE: No modification of the cam table is possible.

rows.Name: bCAMchanged
rows.Comment: TRUE: Cam has been changed in the visualization.

rows: TRUE: Error has occurred within the function block.
